description: The problem is that when attempting to append an item to a List, a runtime error occurs. This is because the item being appended is not of the same type as the elements already in the List.
code:
# Program to demonstrate basic operations on a list in Python

# Create a list with 5 elements
my_list = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]

# Print the list
print(my_list)
